TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsExplicitlyDereferenced extends System.Object
public ref class IsExplicitlyDereferenced abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示托管指针表示某方法签名内的指针参数。

span.span: Indicates that a managed pointer represents a pointer parameter within a method signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 c + + 中，托管指针和托管引用作为指针发出到元数据中。In C++, managed pointers and managed references are emitted into metadata as pointers. 若要在元数据中区分这两种类型，Microsoft c + + 编译器将此修饰符应用于托管指针。To distinguish between the two types in metadata, the Microsoft C++ compiler applies this modifier to managed pointers. 它不会对托管引用类型发出修饰符。It emits no modifier on managed reference types. 从元数据范围导入方法时，编译器需要知道正确的调用语法。Compilers need to know the correct calling syntax when importing a method from metadata scope. 类及其伙伴、 类、区分指针参数的歧义引用参数。The class and its partner, the class, disambiguate reference parameters from pointer parameters. 编译器在元数据中发出自定义修饰符，以更改当默认行为不合适时实时（JIT）编译器处理值的方式。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到自定义修饰符时，它将按修饰符指定的方式处理值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以对方法、参数和返回值应用自定义修饰符。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以使用以下方法之一将自定义修饰符发送到元数据中：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用类中的方法 ，例如 、 、 和 。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）指令文件，其中包含对和的调用 `modopt` `modreq` ，并使用[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler)汇编文件。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler). - 使用非托管反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用反射将对象发送到程序集。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
